issue.title: Ability to add keywords others than from thesaurus GEMET
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

The stereotype "Thesaurus GEMET" allows only the metadata editor to add keywords from the thesaurus.
We need to add others keywords (for example, very specific to a geodata or a place) not available in the thesaurus.

My proposal is to adapt the stereotype "thesaurus GEMET" by adding, beside the button "thesaurus GEMET", :

1) a free text field where the user write a keyword 
2) a button "+" to add the keyword to the list of keyword above

Please comment.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

The "multilingual" issue is not that easy to handle with this proposal... using a Thesaurus helps a lot since they deal with it.

So maybe a simpler approach would be to use the current stereotype "locale" and attach it to the attribute "keyword"

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Current GEMET thesaurus could be also extended/adapted with other thesaurus sources, like it's done here (in french) :
http://www.neogeo-online.net/blog/archives/416/

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

An alternative way would be using a single field, with auto-complete from Gemet thesaurus but not restricted to gemet values.
It could look like : timschlechter.github.io/bootstrap-tagsinput/examples/ (see Typeahead section).
A new stereotype? An alternative layout ?
